alert.note: Alert for White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 2:35PM MST until December 29 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected to increase by 8 pm mst this evening. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties. * WHEN...Through 5 AM MST Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio...commercial television or radio stations...or your cable television service provider for updates on this Winter Storm.

area.areaDesc: White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow
